Instance.description: An interaction that selects an attractor point and then pushes a continuation interaction targetting that attractor point.

TunableEnum.name: _attractor_point_identifier
TunableEnum.description: The identifier that will be used to select which attractor points we will use.

Tunable.name: _attractor_point_interaction
Tunable.description: The affordance that we will push on the Sim once the attractor point selection has been made.
